design.layout: full-width with header navigation and table structure

typography.headingStyle: Large bold sans-serif (Portfolio), with descriptive subheading in lighter gray
typography.bodyStyle: Regular weight sans-serif for navigation and labels, medium size
typography.dataStyle: Monospace or numeric-optimized font for table headers and data columns

components.description: Sticky header with logo, main nav items (Pools, Portfolio, Trade, Stake, Wavebreak, More), Connect Wallet button
components.notable: Yellow accent button (Connect Wallet) stands out against dark background

components.description: Token search field with placeholder 'Search tokens...'
components.notable: Dark input with subtle border, provides quick access to filter data

components.description: Column headers: Pool, Balance, Pending Yield, Est. Yield, Position Range, Current Price
components.notable: Includes time range selector (24H) and info tooltip on Est. Yield

components.description: List view, grid view, and settings icons
components.notable: Icon-based toggle for different data visualization modes

design.visualHierarchy: Clear top-to-bottom flow: navigation â†’ heading + description â†’ search â†’ table headers â†’ empty state CTA
innovativeElements: Yellow accent color (uncommon in crypto UI) creates distinctive branding
Information tooltip on 'Est. Yield' suggests complex feature explanation

flow.userIntent: View and manage active liquidity positions across pools

interactiveElements.action: Initiates wallet connection flow to authenticate user and load portfolio data
Real-time token filtering of portfolio items
Changes time period for yield calculations
Switches between list and grid layouts

flow.informationArchitecture: Three-level structure: (1) Hero section with heading, (2) Search/filter controls, (3) Empty table with column definitions awaiting data
frictionPoints: Empty state requires wallet connection before any data is visible
No preview or example data shown to educate users on what they'll see post-connection

copy.headline: Portfolio
copy.subheadline: Track and manage your active liquidity positions.

microcopy.purpose: Instructs user on filtering functionality

dataFormatting: Column headers suggest: token addresses, dollar amounts, percentages, price ranges, current prices

design.layout: full-width with hero section, feature card, and card grid layout for past launches

typography.headingStyle: Large bold sans-serif (Wavebreak, Premier Launches), prominent and hierarchical
typography.bodyStyle: Regular sans-serif body text, medium line-height for readability

components.description: Left-aligned content with 'PREMIER' badge, heading, explanatory text, and 'Apply Now' link

components.description: Centered callout box with rocket icon, question headline, and CTA button

components.description: Dropdown menu (Premier Launches selected), Filter icon, and 'Newest' sort option
components.notable: Dark button styling matches design system

components.description: 'Live & Upcoming' section title with 'No active launches' message

design.visualHierarchy: Hero content on left pulls focus, promotional box on right balances layout; empty state clearly marked; past launches grid anchors bottom with concrete examples

Progress bar visualization with mint green accent color
PREMIER badge branding across multiple card types

flow.userIntent: Discover and apply to token launches (Wavebreak feature), particularly Premier Launches

Same action as primary CTA, alternative entry point
Likely navigates to project detail or external link

flow.informationArchitecture: Top-level feature promotion â†’ filter/sort controls â†’ empty state for active launches â†’ concrete examples of past launches

Two Apply buttons create slight redundancy
progressIndicators: Progress bars on past launch cards showing fundraising progress
